definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I got a splinter in my finger while I was moving the boxes.
sentences.chinese: 我在搬箱子的时候手指头上扎了一根刺。

sentences.english: But Jesus bowing himself down, wrote with his finger on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣却弯下身去，用指头在地上画字。

sentences.english: Does it bother you if I stir it with my fingers, old-timer?
sentences.chinese: 介意我用指头搅拌一下吗，老家伙？

sentences.english: And again he stooped down, and wrote on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 于是又弯着腰用指头在地上画字。

sentences.english: Mary has more goodness in her little finger than he has in his whole body.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽伸出一个小指头比他整个人都强。

sentences.english: Hers is a manically full life.
sentences.chinese: 她的每一只手指头都是脏的。

sentences.english: People toes are long, long but the soles of his feet.
sentences.chinese: 人的脚指头再长，也长不过他的脚板。
弯曲的腿和扭曲的指头。

sentences.english: He ran his forefinger around the lip of the jug, then put the finger in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他用食指在酒壶嘴儿上一抹，再把这指头放进嘴里。

sentences.english: Larry is too lazy to lift a finger.
sentences.chinese: 拉里懒得不想动指头去帮任何人。

sentences.english: Put your finger on your lips as you read silently .
sentences.chinese: 当你默读时，把你的指头放在你的嘴唇上。

sentences.english: When he saw her, his face puckered and he began to cry, holding up a grubby bruised finger.
sentences.chinese: 他一看见她，就歪着脸举着一个受伤的指头哭起来了。

sentences.english: Don't use these for a severed finger.
sentences.chinese: 千万别用这些布袋子来盛切断了的手指头。

sentences.english: Emily laid her finger on her lips, but the word Irene had caught James's ear.
sentences.chinese: 爱米丽用一只指头抵着嘴，可是，伊琳两个字已。

sentences.english: Larry is too lazy to lift a finger to help anybody.
sentences.chinese: 拉里懒得不想动指头去帮助任何人。

sentences.english: He stretched the three thick fingers of both hands and flexed the opposable thumbs.
sentences.chinese: 两只手都把三个指头伸直，弯曲拇指。

definition: the five fingers of one's hand
